directions: Melt Country Crock® Spread in 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and cook red peppers and onion until tender and golden, about 8 minutes. Stir in garlic, cumin and chili powder and cook, stirring frequently, 2 minutes. Remove from heat, stir in lime juice and cilantro.
ingredients: 2 medium red or yellow bell peppers, sliced
1 medium sweet onion, cut into thin wedges
title: Fajita Vegetable Stir-Fry | Allrecipes
